long_description: When you're being lured into deep pow and endless turns, at least keep your vision clear with the Giro Siren women's snow goggles. Titanium Cable frame has a gray tint Persimmon Boost lens with 52% visible light transmission (VLT) and a mirror finish for excellent detail and depth perception in low light. Black Pine frame has an Amber Pink lens with 37% VLT, versatile amber tint and pink mirror finish to cut glare and supply good definition in mixed light conditions. Cylindrical lens is made using an injection-molding process that helps minimize lens distortion so you can see clearly. Anti-fog coating and lens vents also help prevent inner lens from fogging up and obstructing your view. Dual-layer face foam features a fleece layer to ensure a comfortable seal around the face. Frame is engineered to offer an optimal, ergonomic fit around the face, resulting in excellent comfort and helmet compatibility. The Giro Siren women's snow goggles are designed to fit medium-size adult faces.
short_description: When you're being lured into deep pow and endless turns, at least keep your vision clear with the Giro Siren women's snow goggles.
